name: parasitize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of an animal or plant) to live on or in another animal or plant of a different type and feed from it : These tiny beetles parasitize other insects. The flowers parasitise the grass and reduce its vigour.
More examplesFewer examplesE. dispar parasitizes the human intestine but does not cause illness.Results showed significant differences between parasitized and non-parasitized larvae.Some pathogens suppress the immune system by parasitising cells such as macrophages and T cells.
